name: recyclarr
description: Recyclarr is a CLI tool for syncing custom formats and quality profiles between Radarr/Sonarr and community templates using YAML configuration.
features: Custom format sync: Apply community-maintained quality profiles to Radarr and Sonarr automatically.
YAML configuration: Define all settings in version-controlled YAML files for reproducible setups.
TRaSH Guides integration: Use curated quality profiles from the TRaSH Guides community.
Quality profile management: Synchronize preferred words, release profiles, and scoring across instances.
Dry-run mode: Preview changes before applying them to avoid unintended modifications.
Multi-instance support: Manage multiple Radarr and Sonarr installations from a single configuration.
Automated updates: Run on a schedule to keep quality profiles in sync with community recommendations.
Custom scoring: Override default scores for specific release groups or quality attributes.
Template system: Create reusable configuration templates for consistent setups across environments.
CLI interface: Execute sync operations from the command line for scripting and automation.
Validation checks: Verify configuration syntax and API connectivity before applying changes.
Rollback support: Revert to previous configurations if new profiles cause issues.
